inclusion.criterion: negative screening monolayer Pap smear or hysterectomy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: history of at least two prior symptomatic UTI's treated within the past 12 months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: agree to return for the Randomization Visit (Visit 2)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: regular menstrual cycles or amenorrheic due to use of a long acting progestin,
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: continuous use of oral contraceptives or hysterectomy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: willing to insert vaginal capsules without an applicator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to read and understand English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: vaginal or cervical infection, currently or within the past 21 days, with bacterial vaginosis (treated, symptomatic infection), Trichomonas vaginalis, Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Chlamydia trachomatis or Herpes Simplex
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: high risk for sexually transmitted diseases and/or HIV, including: diagnosis of N. gonorrhoeae, C. trachomatis or T. vaginalis on two or more occasions during the previous six months;
exclusion.label: unknown
